summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SwiftMove mobility platform MVP. Backend API testing achieved 88.9% success rate with core functionality working. Frontend testing achieved 95%+ success rate with all major user flows functional. Quebec tax calculation, booking system, and multi-role dashboards are working correctly.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 404 - Driver profile not found during registration
critical_bugs.impact: Driver profiles not created properly during registration process

fixed_during_testing.issue: Was returning 500 error when driver profile missing
fixed_during_testing.fix_applied: Added null check to handle missing driver profiles

fixed_during_testing.issue: Was returning 500 error when driver profile missing
fixed_during_testing.fix_applied: Added fallback data when driver profile doesn't exist

integration_issues.issue: Admin registration redirects to landing page instead of admin dashboard
integration_issues.note: User is still logged in as admin and can access dashboard via navigation

passed_tests: Landing page loads with services overview and driver count (15 drivers online)
User registration and login flows work correctly
Fare estimation with Quebec tax breakdown (GST 5% + QST 9.975%)
Driver dashboard shows available jobs and earnings
Driver can toggle online status and accept jobs
Admin dashboard shows stats (users, drivers, bookings, revenue)
Navigation between admin dashboard tabs (users, drivers, bookings)
Backend API health checks and authentication
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix driver profile creation during registration process. The driver profile document is not being created properly in the database when a user registers with role='driver', causing 404 errors on /api/driver/profile endpoint.
